text: Luminița Gheorghiu (; 1 September 1949 – 4 July 2021) was a Romanian actress. She was known for her roles in The Death of Mr. Lazarescu (2006) and Child's Pose (2013). Gheorghiu died on July 4, 2021, at the age of 71.Actrița Luminița Gheorghiu a murit. Era cunoscută pentru roluri din "Moromeţii" sau "Moartea domnului Lăzărescu" ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian stage actors Category:Romanian television actors Category:Actors from Bucharest
title: Luminița Gheorghiu
